column4: hi guys, question: when i "make" i get this error "make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1" any clues as to what packages i need?
Can you put the last several lines that output onto http://paste.ubuntu.com/ , and then paste the link back here?
sure
http://paste.ubuntu.com/425677/
Well, I don't see anything in that output that tells me if you are missing anything.
Although I'll point out that quakeforge has a repository for debian/ubuntu if you are using i386 (32-bit)
omg no way
whats it called exactaly?
looks like it's a version behind though.
It's on the download page at http://www.quakeforge.net/files.php
awww yeah i saw that one allready
thanks for your help though
In the INSTALL file in the source download lists the packages you should have. Make sure you have the "-dev" packages of each one that is available.
ok ill look again
ive been chasing this for a few hours now
My guess is you are missing the Ogg Vorbis package, since you failed in the sound folder. Do you have libogg-dev?
gettin it now
no luck after that one
Any change in the output?
nope, i may just try the old version, its funny they give you the "deb" to add to get it with apt but they dont tell you what they call it exactaly
Googling around, it looks like this has been a problem since edgy.
well thanks for the help man, im gonna give up and turn in tonight, thanks!
